overview.summary: Visualize a vector field with arrows.

description.p: Visualize a vector field with arrows.

This module interpolates data values to create arrows that represent the vector field. A frame widget with slider bars is sent to the Viewer window and the sampling can be control by sliding disks on the frame.

If "2D" is selected, a 2D slice of the vector field will be created. The "Find" buttons in the upper right allow the user to select a centered axis aligned plane. If "3D" is selected a three-dimensional frame widget that surrounds the entire domain will control the sampling.
Vector colors can be adjusted so that they appear on various backgrounds. The arrow length and head sizes can also be adjusted.
